alert.note: Alert for La Paz; Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 19 at 11:44PM MST until August 20 at 1:45AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... East Central La Paz County in west central Arizona... * Until 145 AM MST. * At 1144 PM MST, Upstream gauge reports indicated flow in Centennial Wash will increase through the warning area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen over the warning area. Flash flooding is ongoing. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of highways, normally dry washes, and structures in low lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Salome and Harcuvar. This includes the following highways... Salome Highway. This includes the following streams and drainages... Centennial Wash and Salome Wash. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
